Verses: 1 appozhudhu Raajaa Yoodhaavilum Erusalemilum Irundha Moopparaiyellaam Azhaippiththaan; Avargal Avanidaththil Koodinapodhu,

2 raajaavum, Avanodu Yoodhaavin Manushar Yaavarum Erusalemin Kudigal Anaivarum, Aasaariyargalum, Theerkkadharisigalum, Siriyordhuvakkip Periyormattumulla Sagalarum Karththarin Aalayaththukkup Ponaargal; Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Kandedukkappatta Udanpadikkai Pusthagaththin Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Avargal Kaadhugal Ketka Vaasiththaan.

3 appozhudhu Raajaa, Thoon Aruge Nindru, Karththaraip Pinpatri Nadakkavum, Avarudaiya Karpanaigalaiyum Avarudaiya Saatchigalaiyum Avarudaiya Kattalaigalaiyum Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Muzhu Aaththumaavodum Kaikkollavum, Andhap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkira Andha Udanpadikkaiyin Vaarththaigalai Niraivetravum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Udanpadikkaipanninaan; Janangal Ellaarum Udanpadikkaikku Utpattaargal.
4 pinbu Raajaa: Paagaalukkum Vikkiragaththoppukkum Vaanaththin Sagala Senaigalukkum Pannappattirundha Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum Karththarudaiya

aalayaththilirundhu Purambaakka, Pradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Ilkkiyaavukkum Irandaam Vaguppilulla Aasaariyargalukkum Vaasal Kaakkiravargalukkum Kattalaiyittu, Avaigalai Erusalemukkup Purambaaik Keedharon Veligalil Sutteriththu, Avaigalin Saambalai Beththelukkuk Kondupokappanninaan.

5 yoodhaavin Pattanangalilum Erusalemai Sutrilum Medaigalinmel Thoobangaatta, Yoodhaavin Raajaakkal Vaiththa Poojaasaarigalaiyum, Paagaalukkum Sooriyanukkum Sandhiranukkum Kiragangalukkum Vaanaththin Sagala Senaigalukkum Thoobankaattinavargalaiyum Agatrivittaan.

6 thoppu Vikkiragaththai Karththarin Aalayaththilirundhu Erusalemukkup Purampe Keedharon Aatrirkuk Kondupoi, Adhaik Keedharon Aatru Oraththile Sutteriththu, Adhaith Thoolaakki, Andhath Thoolai Janapuththirarudaiya Piredhak Kuzhigalinmel Poduviththaan.
7 karththarin Aalayaththirku Aruge Sthreegal Thoppu Vikkiragaththukkuk Koodaarangalai Neydha Idaththilulla Lachchaiyaana Punarchchikkaararin Veedugalai Idiththuppottaan.

8 avan Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilulla Ellaa Aasaariyaraiyum Vara Solli, Kebaamudhal Peyersebaamattum Aasaariyargal Thoobankaattiyirundha Medaigalaith Theettaakki, Olimugavaasalgalin Medaigalaiyum, Pattanaththu Vaasalukkuppogum Vazhikku Idadhupuramaayirukkira Pattanaththalaivanaagiya Yosuvaavin Vaasarpadiyil Irundha Medaiyaiyum Idiththuppottaan.
9 medaigalin Aasaariyargal Erusalemilirukkira Karththarudaiya Balipeedaththinmel Baliyidaamal, Thangal Sagodhararukkulle Pulippillaadha Appangalaip Pusikkiradharkumaaththiram Uththaram Petraargal.

10 oruvanum Molegukkendru Than Kumaaranaiyaagilum Than Kumaaraththiyaiyaagilum Theekkadakkappannaadhapadikku, Innom Puththirarin Pallaththaakkilirukkira Thoppedh Ennum Sthalaththaiyum Avan Theettaakki,

11 karththarin Aalayaththirkul Pogira Idandhodangi, Pattanaththukkup Purampe Irukkira Naaththaanmelek Ennum Pradhaaniyin Arai Veedu Mattum Yoodhaavin Raajaakkal Sooriyanukkendru Vaiththirundha Kudhiraigalai Agatri, Sooriyanin Radhangalai Akkiniyil Sutteriththaan.

12 yoodhaavin Raajaakkal Undaakkinadhum, Aagaasudaiya Melveettil Irundhadhumaana Balipeedangalaiyum, Manaase Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Irandu Piraagaarangalilum Undaakkina Balipeedangalaiyum Raajaa Idiththu, Avaigalin Thoolai Angeyirundhu Eduththuk Keedharon Aatril Kottinaan.

13 erusalemukku Edhire Irukkira Naasamalaiyin Valadhupuraththil Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Saalomon Seedhoniyarin Aruvaruppaagiya Astharoththirkum, Movaabiyarin Aruvaruppaagiya Kaamosukkum, Ammon Puththirarin Aruvaruppaagiya Milkomukkum Kattiyirundha Medaigalaiyum Raajaa Theettaakki,
14 silaigalai Udaiththu, Vikkiragath Thoppugalai Nirmoolamaakki, Avaigalin Sthalaththai Manusharin Elumbugalaal Nirappinaan.

15 isravelaip Paavancheyyappannina Nebaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Yerobeyaam Beththelil Undaakkiyirundha Balipeedamum Medaiyum Aagiya Avvirandaiyum Avan Idiththu, Andha Medaiyai Sutteriththuth Thoolaakki Vikkirath Thoppaiyum Sutteriththaan.

16 yosiyaa Thirumbippaarkkirapodhu Ange Andha Malaiyilirukkira Kallaraigalaik Kandu, Aatkalai Anuppi, Andhak Kallaraigalilulla Elumbugalai Eduththu Varachcheydhu, Ippadi Nadakkum Endru Dhevanudaiya Manushan Koorina Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Avaigalai Andha Balipeedaththinmel Sutteriththu Adhaith Theettaakkinaan.

17 appozhudhu Avan: Naan Kaangira Andhak Kurippadaiyaalam Enna Endru Kettadharku, Andhap Pattanaththu Manushar: Adhu Yoodhaavilirundhu Vandhu, Neer Seydha Indhak Kiriyaigalai Beththelin Balipeedaththirku Virodhamaaik Koori, Ariviththa Dhevanudaiya Manushanin Kallarai Endraargal.
18 adharku Avan: Irukkattum, Oruvanum Avan Elumbugalaith Thodavendaam Endraan; Appadiye Avan Elumbugalai Samaariyaavilirundhu Vandha Theerkkadharisiyin Elumbugalodu Vittuvittaargal.

19 karththarukkuk Kobamundaakka Isravelin Raajaakkal Samaariyaavin Pattanangalil Undaakkiyirundha Medaigalin Kovilgalaiyellaam Yosiyaa Thagarththu, Beththelile Thaan Seydha Seygaigalinpadiye Avaigalukku Seydhu,
20 avvidangalil Irukkira Medaigalin Aasaariyargalaiyellaam Balipeedangalinmel Kondrupottu, Avaigalinmel Manusharin Elumbugalai Sutteriththu, Erusalemukkuth Thirumbinaan.
21 pinbu Raajaa: Indha Udanpadikkaiyin Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Paskaavai Aasariyungal Endru Sagala Janangalukkum Kattalaiyittaan.

22 isravelai Nyaayam Visaariththa Nyaayaadhipadhigalin Naatkal Thodangi, Isravelin Raajaakkal Yoodhaavin Raajaakkal Aagiya Avargaludaiya Sagala Naatkalilum Indhap Paskaavaippol Paskaa Aasarikkappadavillai.
23 raajaavaagiya Yosiyaavin Padhinettaam Varushaththile Karththarukku Indhap Paskaa Erusalemile Aasarikkap Pattadhu.

24 aasaariyanaagiya Ilkkiyaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Kandeduththa Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkira Nyaayappramaanaththin Vaarththaigalai Niraivetrumpadikku, Yosiyaa Anjanakkaararaiyum, Kurisollugiravargalaiyum, Suroobangalaiyum Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaiyum, Yoodhaadhesaththilum Erusalemilum Kaanappatta Ellaa Aruvaruppugalaiyum Nirmoolamaakkinaan.

25 karththaridaththukkuth Than Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Than Muzhu Aaththumaavodum Than Muzhu Balaththodum Moseyin Nyaayappramaanaththirku Etrapadiyellaam Seyya Manadhai Saaiththaan; Avanaip Poloththa Raajaa Avanukkumun Irundhadhumillai, Avanukkuppin Ezhumbinadhumillai.
26 aagilum, Manaase Karththarukkuk Kobamundaakkina Sagala Kaariyangalinimiththamum Avar Yoodhaavinmel Konda Thammudaiya Magaa Kobaththin Ukkiraththai Vittuth Thirumbaamal:

27 naan Isravelaith Thallivittadhu Pola Yoodhaavaiyum En Mugaththai Vittuth Thalli, Naan Therindhukonda Indha Erusalem Nagaraththaiyum, En Naamam Vilangum Endru Naan Sonna Aalayaththaiyum Veruththuviduven Endru Karththar Sonnaar.
28 yosiyaavin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhavai Yaavum, Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.

29 avan Naatkalil Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonneko Aseeriyaa Raajaavukku Virodhamaai Aipiraaththu Nadhikkup Pogirapodhu Raajaavaagiya Yosiyaa Avanukku Edhiraagap Purappattaan; Paarvonneko Avanai Megodhovile Kandapodhu, Avanaik Kondru Pottaan.

30 maranamadaindha Avanai Avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Radhaththinmel Etri, Megodhovilirundhu Erusalemukkuk Konduvandhu, Avanai Avan Kallaraiyil Adakkampanninaargal; Appozhudhu Dhesaththin Janangal Yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaagaasai Azhaiththu, Avanai Abishegampanni, Avan Thagappan Sthaanaththil Avanai Raajaavaakkinaargal.
31 yovaagaas Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththumoondru Vayadhaayirundhu, Moondru Maadham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Lipnaa Ooraanaagiya Eremiyaavin Kumaaraththiyaana Avan Thaayinper Amuththaal.
32 avan Than Pidhaakkal Seydhapadiyellaam Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.

33 avan Erusalemil Arasaalaadhapadikku, Paarvonneko Avanai Aamaath Dhesamaana Riplaavile Pidiththuk Kattuviththu, Dhesaththinmel Nooru Thaalandhu Velliyaiyum Oru Thaalandhu Ponnaiyum Abaraadhamaaga Sumaththi,

34 yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaakkeemai Avan Thagappanaagiya Yosiyaavin Sthaanaththil Raajaavaaga Vaiththu, Avan Perai Yoyaakkeem Endru Maatri, Yovaagaasaik Kondupoi Vittaan; Ivan Egipthile Poi Ange Maranamadaindhaan.

35 andha Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Yoyaakkeem Paarvonukkuk Koduththaan; Aanaalum Paarvonudaiya Kattalaiyinpadi Andhap Panaththaik Kodukkumpadi Avan Dhesaththai Madhippittu, Avaravar Madhippinpadi Andha Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Paarvon Nekovukkuk Kodukkaththakkadhaaga Dhesaththu Janangalin Kaiyile Thandinaan.
36 yoyaakkeem Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththaindhu Vayadhaayirundhu, Padhinoruvarusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Roomaa Ooraanaagiya Pedhaayaamin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Avan Thaayinper Sebudhaal.
37 avan Than Pidhaakkal Seydhapadiyellaam Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.
